          <display value="Additional Information Sources" />
        </supportingInfo>
        <activity>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sd-codes" />
              <code value="4389" />
              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SD Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />
              <code value="DX02" />
              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>
  </entry>

              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>

          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />
              <code value="DX02" />
              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>

          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sd-codes" />
              <code value="4389" />
              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SD Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />
              <code value="DX02" />
              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>

          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />

              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />

          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sd-codes" />

              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>

          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />

              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>

              <code value="4389" />
              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SD Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />
              <code value="DX02" />
              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

        <activity>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sd-codes" />
              <code value="4389" />
              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SD Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />
              <code value="DX02" />
              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />

            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>

            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />

              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

        <activity>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sd-codes" />
              <code value="4389" />
              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SD Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />
              <code value="DX02" />
              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sd-codes" />
              <code value="4389" />
              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SD Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />
              <code value="DX02" />
              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>

            <coding>

              <code value="4389" />
              <display value="ED post tonsillectomy bleeding" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SD Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-dx-codes" />
              <code value="DX02" />
              <display value="The individual needs to attend an emergency treatment centre within 1 hour." />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment DX Code" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-pathway-codes" />
              <code value="PA21" />
              <display value="Chest and Upper Back Pain" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Presenting Complaint - selected Pathway or Template" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <coding>
              <system value="https://fhir.nhs.uk/CodeSystem/pathways-sg-codes" />
              <code value="1010" />
              <display value="Allergic Reaction" />
            </coding>
            <text value="Pathways Assessment SG Code - Chief Complaint" />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeCodeableConcept>
            <text value="PATHWAYS ASSESSMENT:/n        An injury or health problem was the reason for the contact./n        Heavy bleeding had not occurred in the previous 2 hours./n        An illness or health problem was the main problem. - bleeding for 15 minutes/n        The individual was not fighting for breath./n        The main reason for the assessment was not an allergic reaction, heart attack, chest/upper back pain, probable/n        stroke, recent fit/seizure or suicide attempt./n        The main reason for contact was not new confusion, declared diabetic hypo/hyperglycaemia, or ICD shock./n        The skin on the torso felt normal, warm or hot./n        Pathway Selected: PW818, Nosebleeds without Injury/n        The individual was not feeling faint or dizzy./n        The nose was continuing to bleed./n        There was no nasal foreign body./n        Constant pressure for at least 10 minutes had not been applied./n        There was no spontaneous bruising, abnormal bleeding or frequent nosebleeds within the previous 2 weeks./n        The individual did not use anticoagulant medication or have a bleeding/clotting disorder." />
          </outcomeCodeableConcept>
          <outcomeReference>
            <reference value="urn:uuid:fa7a9782-e111-49a5-9660-826b29c51d56" />
          </outcomeReference>
        </activity>
      </CarePlan>
    </resource>
